title: The Secret to Effortless Productivity & Overcoming Overwhelm w/Greg McKeown EP 1102
description:
“If you can’t work any harder, you’ve got to find an easier path.”

Today's guest is Greg McKeown. Greg is a speaker, bestselling author, and host of the podcast, What’s Essential. His work has been covered by the New York Times, Fortune, and Inc.. He previously wrote the New York Times bestselling book, Essentialism: The Disciplined Pursuit of Less, which has sold more than a million copies worldwide. He’s now written a new book called EFFORTLESS: Make It Easier To Do What Matters Most.

In this episode Lewis and Greg discuss the simple and surprising keys for a productive life, the 5 questions to ask yourself before starting a new project, how to stop beating ourselves up for relaxing more often in our lives, the two questions that changed the course of Greg McKeown’s life, and so much more!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1102

Check out Greg's podcast: What’s Essential

Check out Greg's new book: Effortless

The Wim Hof Experience: Mindset Training, Power Breathing, and Brotherhood: https://link.chtbl.com/910-pod

A Scientific Guide to Living Longer, Feeling Happier & Eating Healthier with Dr. Rhonda Patrick: https://link.chtbl.com/967-pod

The Science of Sleep for Ultimate Success with Shawn Stevenson: https://link.chtbl.com/896-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
